sentences.english: Building a concrete Koi pond is a very expensive thing to do.
sentences.chinese: 建设一个具体的锦鲤池是一个非常昂贵的事情。

sentences.english: What impressed me most were the Jin Carp with colorful appearance there.
sentences.chinese: 给我们印象很深的是那里的锦鲤，色彩很艳丽。

sentences.english: Amazingly, when placed in a lake, koi can grow to three feet long.
sentences.chinese: 令人惊讶的是，当放养在湖泊里，锦鲤能长到三尺长。

sentences.english: Our children always enjoy feeding the koi fish at the park pool.
sentences.chinese: 我们的孩子一向喜欢去公园鱼池喂锦鲤。

sentences.english: Regularly use of AOKO KOI can effectively prevent algae growth.
sentences.chinese: 只需准时添加锦鲤青子，便能有用地防备藻类滋长。

sentences.english: In order to prevent your Koi from becoming ill you'll need to take some precautions.
sentences.chinese: 为了防止您的锦鲤从得病你需要采取一些预防措施。

sentences.english: To all our customers and koi lovers.
sentences.chinese: 甲洞锦鲤的所有顾客和爱好者。

sentences.english: Red fish in a koi pond in Suzhou, China(This photo and caption were submitted to My Shot.)
sentences.chinese: 中国苏州锦鲤池里的金鱼。

sentences.english: Koi carps swim in a pond of a breeding farm near Gent in Belgium on Aug. 17.
sentences.chinese: 锦鲤八月十七日于比利时根特附近的池塘里悠游。

sentences.english: Koi Pond in the Side Yard.
Koi breeding industry in China is just at its beginning.
sentences.chinese: 锦鲤养殖业在中国的发展仅仅是开始。

definition: Yuchi or Yuchih township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
lit. inviting wealth/We wish you success and riches (cf idiom 招財進寶|招财进宝[zhao1 cai2 jin4 bao3])
lit. (may you) have abundance year after year/(an auspicious saying for the Lunar New Year)
